title_sort: walt whitman to the editor of the north american review, 3 october 1890
title: Walt Whitman to the editor of The North American Review, 3 October 1890

person.name: The Editor of the North American Review

recipient.name: The Editor of the North American Review

people: The Editor of the North American Review
text: Camden New JerseyEvn'g Oct: 3 1890Y'rs asking me to write piece for Review &c: rec'd—Yes, (and thanks)—Just now my chosen theme and head-line w'd be "Old Poets—(and other things.)" It takes in the subject you mention too. If that sh'd suit I w'd send you in a week—Walt WhitmanI must apologize to (I think) Mr Bryce anent of his letter & request quite long ago—I was critically ill at the time & the letter got neglected— Walt Whitman to the editor of The North American Review, 3 October 1890
